TopicTitle: Can attach nodes defined by transforms be rotated/moved in .cfg?

Articles.Content:
Title.

NODE
{
name = A1
transform = ANode1
size = 1
method = FIXED_JOINT

Is there still a line I can add that can rotate or move the node within this definition, or am I stuck with the transform axis?
